mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Stock (stockno, symbol, name, industry, description, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES (Stock_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{symbol}, #{name}, #{industry}, #{description}, #{file1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file1saved, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumb1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Stock ORDER BY stockno ASC

SELECT stockno, symbol, name, industry, description FROM Stock WHERE (#{stockSearchSymbol} IS NULL OR symbol LIKE '%' || #{stockSearchSymbol} || '%') AND (#{stockSearchName} IS NULL OR name LIKE '%' || #{stockSearchName} || '%') AND (#{stockSearchIndustry} IS NULL OR industry LIKE '%' || #{stockSearchIndustry} || '%')

SELECT stockno, symbol, name, industry, description, file1saved, thumb1, size1, r FROM ( SELECT stockno, symbol, name, industry, description, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rownum AS r FROM ( SELECT stockno, symbol, name, industry, description, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM stock WHERE (#{searchSymbol} IS NULL OR symbol LIKE '%' || #{searchSymbol} || '%') AND (#{searchName} IS NULL OR name LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%') AND (#{searchIndustry} IS NULL OR industry LIKE '%' || #{searchIndustry} || '%') ORDER BY stockno ASC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM stock WHERE (#{searchSymbol} IS NULL OR symbol LIKE '%' || #{searchSymbol} || '%') AND (#{searchName} IS NULL OR name LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%') AND (#{searchIndustry} IS NULL OR industry LIKE '%' || #{searchIndustry} || '%')
